work.name: Capital One
work.summary: Full Stack Developer specializing in server-driven UIs using TypeScript, React, Java and more deployed through AWS.
highlights: Led the migration of a Java-based API from a legacy third-party data source to a custom AWS ECS and GraphQL infrastructure. Analyzed 100,000+ customer accounts and resolved 1,000+ data inconsistencies in collaboration with data engineering to improved reliability ahead of production launch

Built and launched an external-facing site with TypeScript, React, and Next.js, leveraging server-side rendering and a CDN to enable non-technical teams to manage content. Reduced support hours by 75% by streamlining external partner onboarding, boosting both partner satisfaction and internal efficiency

Designed and implemented an AWS OpenSearch-based search solution, making data more accessible. Built a Lambda-driven ingestion pipeline to keep search indexes in sync with live data, ensuring a seamless user experience

Developed and deployed Python microservices on AWS Lambda to deliver customer rewards data across web and mobile platforms. Created Swift-based UI components for the Capital One iOS app, providing rewards data for over 100,000 customers

certificates.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
certificates.issuer: Amazon Web Services Training and Certification
